title: Daycare Nightmare Mini-Monsters
description:
Monsters love their babies, too! That&#039;s why they need a
first-rate daycare center in Monster Town. Help Molly tend to
cooing ghost babies who scare their friends when they get mad
(stock up on diapers!), adorable little witches who play foul
tricks on their playmates when they don&#039;t get their way (hide and
seek, anyone?), plus sweet mini-mummies, burly baby kongs
ferociously cute werewolves and cuddly blobs. Happy monsters mean
bigger tips, sad monsters mean mayhem!

Dynamic play - no level is the same twice!
Changing world - never get bored playing in the same setting
over-and-over!
Build your future - grow your own business as you build your
center!
Grow and expand - amass a wealth of power-ups!

System Requirements:

Minimum:

PC:

Windows Vista, XP SP1 & 2
Pentium III 700 MHz processor or faster
128 MB RAM
800 x 600 minimum screen resolution
Sound card recommended
30 MB available hard drive space

Recommended:

64 MB Video RAM recommended
